attributes.action: Change the voting system to allow the electorate to vote in any constituency they nominate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each voter would be able to nominate the constituency for which they vote. This would bring MPs into line with Hospitals and schools where the public can opt for a constituency away from where they reside. The voting procedure would otherwise remain as it is with a first-past-the-post system.
